data.title: Top 20 best hotels in Sanguesa, Spain
data.meta_description: Big Savings and low prices on Sanguesa, Spain.  Navarra. Spain hotels, motels, resorts and inns. Find best hotel deals and discounts. Book online now or call 24/7 toll-free.
data.text:
Once An Aragonese Mansion, This Hotel Is Located In The Centre Of This Charming Medieval Town And Has Delightful Interiors Including A Fantastic Restaurant With A Fine Wine Selection.Enjoy Authentic, Rustic Design That Is Perfectly Blended With Luxury And Glamour At The Parador Sos Del Rey Católico. The Inviting Lounge Area Has Robust, Wooden Columns And Decor That Will Remind You Of The Building’S History As A Noble Home. Relax On The Open-Air Terrace With A Refreshing Drink And Chat With Friends.Dine In The Elegant Restaurant Which Serves A Good Selection Of Traditional Dishes Presented Exquisitely And Which You Can Accompany With A Fine, Spanish Wine. In The Evening, Enjoy A Drink In The Relaxing Bar.The Parador Sos Del Rey Católico Boasts Its Very Own Tower And Some Charming Gardens To Help You Make The Most Of The Outdoors.Sos Del Rey Católico Is The Birthplace Of Ferdinand Ii Of Aragón, Who Would Marry Isabel I Of Castilla To Form The Most Influential Royal Couple In Spanish History.

Read more

Located In Sos Del Rey Católico, Hotel Triskel Offers Free Wi-Fi In Public Areas And Features A Garden And Terrace With Mountain View. Pamplona Is A 50-Minute Drive Away.Fitted With Parquet Flooring, Each Room Features Air-Conditioning, Heating And A Balcony. The Rooms Have A Private Bathroom With Hairdryer And Amenities.Hotel Triskel Has A Bar And A Restaurant. Tourist Information Is Available At The 24-Hour Front Desk. The Hotel Offers Free Parking.Monasterio Leyre Is 25 Km From The Property. Uncastillo Village Is A 30-Minute Drive Away. Pamplona Airport Is 45 Minutes' Drive From The Hotel.

Read more

This Charming Gust House Is Located In The Historic Centre Of Medieval Town Sos Del Rey Católico. Set In An Emblematic Building, It Offers Traditional-Style, Heated Rooms With Free Wi-Fi And Free Private Parking.The Comfortable, Air-Conditioned Rooms At Hostal Las Coronas Feature Elegant Décor. All Include A Plasma Tv, Minibar And Private Bathroom With Hairdryer.The Property Has A Restaurant Serving Traditional, Regional Cuisine, A Bar And A Pleasant Terrace. There Are Also Several Bars, Restaurants And Shops Within 5 Minutes’ Walk.Las Coronasis Just 100 Metres From The 14Th Century San Esteban Church And The Sada Palace, Birthplace Of King Ferdinand Ii. The City’S Castle Is 5 Minutes’ Walk Away.Hostal Las Coronas Is 60 Km From Pamplona And Less Than2 Hours’ Drive From Zaragoza.

Read more

Located In Lumbier, About 90 Km From Candanchú Ski Station, Hotel Iru-Bide Offers Ski Storage, Free Wi-Fi And Free On-Site Parking. Its Smart, Rustic-Style Rooms Include A Private Bathroom With Free Toiletries.Iru-Bide Hotel Has A Bar And You Will Find Plenty Of Restaurants And Shops Just 200 Metres Away.All Rooms Are Equipped With Air Conditioning, Central Heating And A Flat-Screen Tv. Bed Linen And Towels Are Included And Rooms Are Cleaned Daily.The Monastery Of Leyre Is A 20-Minute Drive Away And Pamplona Can Be Reached In About 30 Minutes By Bus. There Are Direct Buses To And From Lumbier. Isaba Ski Resort Is 55 Km Away.

Read more

Property Location Centrally located in Uncastillo, Rusticae Posada La Pastora is within the region of Pozas de Pigalo and Sadaba Castle. This hostal is within the region of Palacio de Sada and St. Stephen's Church. Rooms Make yourself at home in one of the 10 air-conditioned rooms featuring DVD players and LCD televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and digital programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms have complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include phones, as well as desks and blackout drapes/curtains. Amenities Make use of convenient amenities such as complimentary wireless Internet access, babysitting/childcare (surcharge), and an arcade/game room. Dining Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge. Buffet breakfasts are available daily for a fee. Business, Other Amenities Featured amenities include a business center, laundry facilities, and a library.

Read more

Situated In The Medieval Centre, This Hotel Is Located Just A 2-Minute Walk From The Fabulous Olite Palace And Nestled Within The Beautiful, Rural Surroundings Of Navarra.Take The Short Stroll Down One Of The Most Attractive Streets In Olite To The Impressive Palace. Once A Castle To The Visigoth Kings, It Was Then Converted To A Palacial Home By Charles Iii. You Will Notice The Eclectic Mix Of Architecture That Combines Gothic Arches With Turreted Walls And Regal Gardens.After A Busy Day Of Medieval Culture, Return Back To The Simple Comforts Of Hotel Rural With Its Clever Contrast Of The Traditional Façade And Sleek Interior Design.Breakfast Is Served In The Café. Gluten-Free Breakfasts Are Available On Prior Request.

Read more

Located In The Centre Of This Navarran Village, Parador De Olite Boasts A Fabulous Location In A 15Th-Century Castle. Declared A National Monument, It Has Classically Decorated Bedrooms And A Medieval Atmosphere.Behind The Robust, Stone Walls Of The Parador De Olite Lies A Magical Hotel With Stained-Glass Windows, Arched Walkways And Decoration Which Have Been Carefully Selected To Create An Ambiance Of Majesty And Luxury. Sit In The Communal Lounges With Antique Furnishings, Attractive Tapestries And Atmospheric Lighting. Here You Can Also Browse The Wireless Internet For Free.Sample Regional Specialities In The Olites Restaurant - You Will Feel Like King Or Queen Of Your Very Own Castle Within The Parador De Olites' Impressive Dining Room.

Read more

Set In An 18Th-Century Mansion In The Old Town Of Olite, Hotel La Joyosa Guarda Offers Stylish Rooms With A Balcony. Free Wifi And 24-Hour Reception Are Provided.All Rooms Combine The Past With Present Beautifully With Delicate Modern Touches. All Have Air Conditioning, A Flat-Screen Tv, And Free Wifi. The Private Bathroom Comes With Free Toiletries And A Hairdryer. Some Rooms Have Hydromassage Shower And A Large Round Bath.A Breakfast Is Served Every Morning.Staff At The Tour Desk Will Provide More Information About The Array Of Activities Which Can Be Enjoyed On Site Or In The Surroundings. Other Facilities Offered Include A Library, Free Luggage Storage, And A Laundry. Pamplona Airport Is 38 Km Away, And A Private Parking Is Available On Site At An Extra Cost.

Read more

This Charming Hotel Is Surrounded By Beautiful Gardens With A Private Swimming Pool. It Is By The Historic Old Quarter Of The Medieval City Of Olite.Hotel El Juglar Offers Lovely Classical Design And Modern Facilities. There Is Free Wi-Fi In All Rooms And Public Areas.All The Non-Smoking Rooms At El Juglar Are Spacious And En Suite. There Is Satellite Tv, Air Conditioning And Heating. Bathroom Amenities, A Bathrobe And Slippers Are Included.There Is A Public Lounge With A Fireplace. The Building Has Attractive Stone And Wood Details.The Hotel Is In The Province Of Navarra. The Setting Is Historic. The City Of Olite Was Once Used By The Court Of The Kings Of Navarra.

Read more

This Guest House Is Located In The Navarran Town Of Tafalla, 250 Metres From The Train Station. It Offers Modern Rooms With Free Wifi.The Rooms At Hospedaje Nuestra Señora De Ujue Feature Wooden Floors And Elegant, Minimalist Décor. Each One Comes With Flat-Screen Cable Tv And A Private Bathroom.The Breakfast Offered Is Continental And Includes Tea Or Coffee, Juice, Bread, Butter And Jam As Well As Cereal And Yogurt.With Easy Access To The Ap-15 Motorway, The Hospedaje Is A 30-Minute Drive From Pamplona. Logroño Is Around 1 Hour And 15 Minutes’ Drive Away.

Read more

Hostal Arotza Is Located In The Navarran Town Of Tafalla, 25 Minutes’ Drive From Pamplona. It Offers Air-Conditioned Rooms With Free Wi-Fi, Flat-Screen Satellite Tv And A Private Bathroom.The Arotza’S Restaurant Serves Traditional Navarran Food, Using Local Produce. There Is Also A Bar With A Terrace In The Square. Packed Lunches Are Available If You Are Planning A Day Trip.Tafalla Is A 10-Minute Drive From The Charming Town Of Olite. There Is Easy Access To The Ap-15 Motorway.

Read more

Located Next To The Miguel Induráin Sports Centre, This Modern Design Hotel Offers A Gastronomic Restaurant, Free Wi-Fi And Stylish Air-Conditioned Rooms With A Flat-Screen Tv. Pamplona Is A 30-Minute Drive Away.Each Bright, Functional Room At The Hola Tafalla Includes Wooden Floors And A Safe. The Private Bathroom Includes A Hairdryer And Free Toiletries.Hola Tafalla’S Restaurant Offers Modern Regional Cuisine. There Is Also An On-Site Snack Bar With An Outdoor Terrace. Room Service Is Available On Request.The Hola Tafalla Is Located In The Ar-2 District Of Tafalla,Just 500 Metres From The Town Centre. The Charming Historic Town Of Olite Is 5 Km Away.

Read more

Property Location With a stay at Casa Rural Las Lezas in Biel-Fuencalderas, you'll be 14.4 mi (23.1 km) from Pozas de Pigalo and 15.5 mi (24.9 km) from Sibirana Castle Ruins. This country house is 20.4 mi (32.9 km) from Palace of the Marquis of Ayerbe and 20.5 mi (33.1 km) from Ramon y Cajal Interpretation Center. Rooms Make yourself at home in one of the 6 guestrooms, featuring kitchens with full-sized refrigerators/freezers and ovens. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and flat-screen televisions are provided for your entertainment. Conveniences include microwaves, and both cribs/infant beds (surcharge) and rollaway/extra beds (surcharge) are available on request. Amenities Take in the views from a terrace and a garden and make use of amenities such as complimentary wireless Internet access. Business, Other Amenities Free self parking is available onsite.

Read more

Property Location With a stay at Hostal Izaga in Noain, you'll be near the airport, within a 15-minute drive of Plaza del Castillo and La Morea Shopping Center. This hostal is 2.3 mi (3.8 km) from El Sadar Stadium and 2.5 mi (4 km) from Navarra Arena. Rooms Make yourself at home in one of the 68 air-conditioned rooms featuring flat-screen televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access is available to keep you connected. Private bathrooms with showers feature complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include desks and blackout drapes/curtains, and you can also request cribs/infant beds (complimentary). Amenities Take in the views from a terrace and make use of amenities such as complimentary wireless Internet access and a television in a common area. Dining At Hostal Izaga, enjoy a satisfying meal at the restaurant. Continental breakfasts are available daily from 5:30 AM to 10 AM for a fee. Business, Other Amenities Featured amenities include luggage storage, a safe deposit box at the front desk, and an elevator (lift).

Read more

Rooms With Flat-Panel Tvs And Free Wi-Fi And A Convenient Location 10 Minutes From Downtown Are Part Of The Appeal At The Express By Holiday Inn Pamplona. The Four-Story Hotel Has 77 Air-Conditioned Rooms With Flat-Panel Tvs, Dvd Players And Free Wi-Fi. The Hotel Serves A Daily Breakfast Buffet And Dinner During The Week; The Lobby Lounge Pours Cocktails In A Sophisticated Setting. Additional Amenities Include An On-Site Business Center And Meeting Space. Indoor Parking Is Available For An Extra Fee. The Hotel Is Adjacent To The La Morea Mall. It Is A 10-Minute Drive From The Downtown Area And One Mile From The University Of Navarra And The City'S Old Town. It'S Three Miles To Pamplona Airport, Yamaguchi Park And Plaza De Toros, Four Miles To Salinas De Pamplona And 30 Minutes By Car To Circuito De Navarra Racetrack And Sendaviva Nature Park.

Read more

This Refined 4-Star Hotel Combines The Tranquillity Of This Setting, With Elegance And Sophistication.It Boasts A Privileged Location That Unites Tradition, History And Quality Of Life. There Are Various Types Of Rooms Available, All Equipped Down To The Finest Detail. From Here You Can Gain Direct Access To The Golf Course.The Hotel Facilities Have Been Designed With Your Relaxation In Mind, Such As The Spa, Available For An Extra Cost And Open Weekly From Tuesday Until Sunday Morning, The Fitness Suite And The Lounge Room.Other Facilities At The Property Include A Private Parking With Charging Outlets For Electric Vehicles. A Bicycle Repair Shop Is Also Available.You Can Discover Exquisite Navarran Cuisine In The Restaurant Located In The Very Same Building. This Region Boasts An Unbeatable Landscape That Dominates The Basin Of Pamplona. From Here You Can Quickly Get To The Region’S Capital, Located Only 5 Km Away.

Read more

Satisfy your appetite with local cuisine at Morea, a fine-dining restaurant which features a bar. Dining is also available at the coffee shop/café. Buffet breakfasts are served on weekdays from 7:00 AM to 10:30 AM and on weekends from 7:30 AM to 11:00 AM for a fee.

Read more

With Good Access By Road To The Centre Of Pamplona, Hotel Sercotel Iriguibel Huarte Pamplona Offers Clean, Comfortable, Modern Accommodation In A Quiet, Peaceful Setting.Just 10 Minutes By Car From Pamplona’S Old Quarter And The Centre Of The City, This Modern Hotel Has Good Access By Road To The Region’S Major Road Network. Pamplona’S Airport Is Less Than 10 Km Away And The Forests Of The Pyrenees Are Less Than An Hour’S Drive From The Hotel. There Is Plenty To Do And See In The Area Surrounding The Hotel And The Modern Accommodation And Wide Range Of Services And Facilities Help Make Your Stay As Comfortable And As Enjoyable As Possible.

Read more

Set In 5000 M2 Of Lovely Gardens, The Don Carlos Hotel Is Located Just Outside Pamplona City Centre And Is Ideal Accommodation For Exploring This Historical And Cultural City.Stroll Around Don Carlos’S Beautiful Gardens, And Admire The Sunsets In The Evening. The Gardens Are Also The Perfect Place To Enjoy Sunbathing In Summer, Or A Drink And Chat With Friends.From This Hotel You Can Visit The Nearby Contemporary Art Centre, Or Do Some Shopping At The Itaroa Centre. The City Centre Is Just 5 Km Away, With Easy Access By Car Or Public Transport.Don Carlos Also Boasts Excellent Function Room Facilities, Ideal For Holding A Business Meeting, Conference Or Private Event.

Read more

Almapamplona Features A Spa With An Indoor Pool, Sauna, Hot Tub And Gym. This Modern Design Hotel Includes Elegant Rooms With Free Wi-Fi And A Large Flat-Screen Tv.Hotel Alma Pamplona Muga De Beloso Has A Peaceful Setting In Navarra, With Wonderful Mountain Views. The Hotel Is Near San Juan De Dios Hospital, Just 2Km From Central Pamplona. This Historic City Is Famous For Its San Fermin Festival.The Almapamplona Has A Stylish Restaurant And A Bar. The 24-Hour Reception Can Arrange Airport Transfers And Car Rental. There Is Free Private Parking On Site. Guests Can Also Rent Bicycles To Explore The Countryside.Rooms At The Hotel Are Spacious And Bright, With Climate Control And A Minibar. The Private Bathrooms Are Decorated In Neutral Colours And Include A Selection Of Toiletries.

Read more

Hotel Anaya Is 15 Minutes’ Drive From Jaca And An Hour From Pamplona. Set At The Foot Of The Pyrenees, It Offers Ski Storage, A Free Wi-Fi Zone And Free Parking Nearby.Rooms Are Air Conditioned And Heated. They Have A Tv, Desk And Wardrobe. The Private Bathroom Comes With A Hairdryer And Free Toiletries. Some Rooms Have A Balcony And Rustic Sloped Ceilings.A Continental Breakfast Is Available. The Hotel Has A Café And Restaurant, As Well As A Terrace And Lounge With Billiards. Luggage Storage Is Offered And You Can Go Fishing And Horse Riding In The Surrounding Area.

Read more

Completely Refurbished, Hotel Burlada Is Situated At The Entrance To The Camino De Santiago Pilgrimage Route, Just 5 Minutes’ Drive From Pamplona City Centre. Free Wi-Fi Is Available Throughout The Hotel.The Rooms Feature A Simple Design, Decorated With Pastel Colours And Wooden Furniture. They Come With Air Conditioning, Heating And A Private Bathroom.Breakfast At Burlada Hotel Is Served In The Cafeteria. Snacks Are Also Available From Here During The Day.During The Sanfermín Festival In Pamplona, Buses Run Into The City 24 Hours A Day. Logroño And San Sebastián Are Located 90 Km From The Hotel While Biarritz Is 100 Km Away.

Read more
